summary: Found professional Typst packages (thmbox, theorion, bookly) and LaTeX-like configuration patterns for improving Bimodal documentation. Documented solutions for all flagged issues: TOC bold chapters, hyperlink colors, iff italics, subscript stacking, and abstract formatting.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report covering Typst packages, LaTeX-like styling configuration, and specific fixes for issues flagged in source comments
